New Records: Chet Holmgren had a standout performance with 25 points, 14 rebounds, 5 assists, 2 steals, and 4 blocks
Key Match Events: OKC Thunder crushed the Denver Nuggets in their first game with a score of 102-87
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 28 points, 7 rebounds, and 8 assists
Post-Match Reflections: Oklahoma City Thunder's project is special after their first game
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first game of the 2024/25 NBA season for both teams
